NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
COLEUS: The projection pool has been installed, Oeno! Now, we will be able to project to this site for further inspections in the future.
2
1
CYCAD: This space seems rather small, Coleus.. Will there be enough room for the warp receiver into the <color=orange>Sanctuary?</color>
3 2
OENO: We won't be constructing a warp receiver for this structure, Cycad. It would be too costly - we plan on entering using different means.
4 3
CYCAD: A warp transmitter requires a connected warp receiver to function, does it not?
5 3
CYCAD: Surely there must be a different route of entry other than the one Coleus used.. I have never been comfortable trusting a quantum entity with my life, you see.
6
5
COLEUS: Worry not, Cycad: have you heard of Daz's latest invention? It should provide you with the most convenient entry into the <color=orange>Sanctuary!</color>
7
6
COLEUS: Daz has asked all of us to use his invention during the <color=orange>Sanctuary's</color> construction.. We will be the first to test it thoroughly!
8
7
OENO: How exciting! Cycad, you must visit the <color=orange>Scroll and Stone Workshop</color> on <color=lightblue>Giant's Deep</color> to learn more about Daz's invention when you can!
Campsite EX1.5 4
SY R4 6
SY R3 1
SY R4 6
Workshop R1 11
